00011 class t_editor: public input_handler
00012 {
00013     private:
00014         struct 
00015         {
00016             bool wrapmode;
00017             bool lerpmouse;
00018             bool showparticles;
00019         } options;
00020         
00021         t_editortool *tools[2];
00022         int selected_tool;
00023         
00024         t_brush *curbrush;
00025         
00026         
00027     public:
00028         class t_pgrid *pgrid;
00029         
00030         bool dowrap() { return options.wrapmode; }
00031         bool lerpmouse() { return options.lerpmouse; }
00032         bool showparticles() { return options.showparticles; }
00033 
00034         t_editor(t_pgrid *_pgrid);
00035         
00036         ~t_editor()
00037         {
00038             for(int i= 0; i<sizeof(tools)/sizeof(tools[0]); i++)
00039                 delete tools[i];
00040             if(curbrush) delete curbrush;
00041         }
00042         
00043         t_brush *getbrush()
00044         {
00045             return curbrush? curbrush: (curbrush= new t_blobbrush(30, 30, 0.0));
00046         }
00047         
00048         void phys_tick(float time)
00049         {
00050             tools[selected_tool]->phys_tick(time);
00051         }
00052         
00053         void keyboard_event(SDL_KeyboardEvent &evt)
00054         {
00055             if(evt.type==SDL_KEYDOWN)
00056             if(evt.keysym.sym>='1' && evt.keysym.sym<='9')
00057             {
00058                 int sel= evt.keysym.sym-'1';
00059                 int maxtools= sizeof(tools)/sizeof(tools[0])-1;
00060                 if(sel>maxtools) sel= maxtools;
00061                 selected_tool= sel;
00062             }
00063             else switch(evt.keysym.sym)
00064             {
00065                 case 'w':
00066                     options.wrapmode^= 1;
00067                     printf("Wrap %s\n", options.wrapmode? "on": "off");
00068                     break;
00069                 case 'l':
00070                     options.lerpmouse^= 1;
00071                     printf("Mouse Lerping %s\n", options.lerpmouse? "on": "off");
00072                     break;
00073                 case 'p':
00074                     options.showparticles^= 1;
00075                     printf("Show Particles %s\n", options.showparticles? "on": "off");
00076                     break;
00077                 case '.':
00078                 {
00079                     t_brush *b= getbrush();
00080                     b->resize(b->getwidth()+1, b->getheight()+1);
00081                     break;
00082                 }
00083                 case ',':
00084                 {
00085                     t_brush *b= getbrush();
00086                     b->resize(b->getwidth()-1, b->getheight()-1);
00087                     break;
00088                 }
00089             }
00090         }
00091         void mouse_button_event(SDL_MouseButtonEvent &evt)
00092         {
00093             tools[selected_tool]->mouse_button_event(evt);
00094         }
00095         void mouse_motion_event(SDL_MouseMotionEvent &evt)
00096         {
00097             tools[selected_tool]->mouse_motion_event(evt);
00098         }
00099 };
